metadata.title: CVE-2020-14332 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Ansible Engine when using module_args. Tasks executed with check mode (--check-mode) do not properly neutralize sensitive data exposed in the event data. This flaw allows unauthorized users to read this data. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality.

criterions.comment: ansible package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
